channel.title: Can anyone help me how to sort my java!?!?!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
[center][center][size=36pt][b][u]THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH MY JAVA[/u][/b][/size][/center][/center]
It says: 'JAVA' IS NOT RECOGNIZED AS AN INTERNAL OR EXTERNAL COMMAND, OPERABLE PROGRAM OR BATCH FILE. PRESS ANY KEY TO CONTINUE. . .
HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELPPPPPPPPPPPP MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!PLEASEEE!!

item.title: Can anyone help me how to sort my java!?!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

j19283746:

Yup. Go to Enviroment variables and create a PATH and a CLASSPATH. Correct me if I am wrong.

If you do it this way, you can use the very simple batch line; javac *.java

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me how to sort my java!?!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

Windows 7? You may need to create a PATH to your java.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me how to sort my java!?!?!?!?!?!?

item.title: Can anyone help me how to sort my java!?!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Or whatever he tried running doesn’t have the correct code. Download JDK 6 update 20. Then add this.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles(x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles(x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause start java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause exit pause

Unless you dont have Program FIles (x86) add this.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause start java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause exit pause

Read full topic
